message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. Take this offer, otherwise the money will keep shrinking!
We're both losing money with every round. Let's split it 60/40 in my favor, or we'll both be left with nothing!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you a more than fair 45%, but we need to close this deal now before inflation eats away at the pot even more.
